message_1: What is the SHA-256 hash value of the message "Hello World" in hexadecimal format?
message_2:
To compute the SHA-256 hash value of the message "Hello World", we can use a programming language or an online tool. Here's the Python code to do that:

```python
import hashlib

message = "Hello World"
hash_object = hashlib.sha256(message.encode())
hash_hex = hash_object.hexdigest()

print(hash_hex)
```

The SHA-256 hash value of the message "Hello World" in hexadecimal format is:
`7509e5bda0c762d2bac7f90d758b5b2263fa01ccbc542ab5e3df163be08e6ca9`
